definitions.definition: A fundamental unit of a writing system , corresponding to (for example) letters in the English alphabet or jamo in Korean hangul .
A sequence of one or more code points that are processed and displayed as a single graphical unit of a writing system .
In alphabetic writing, the shortest group of letters composing a phoneme .

main_definition: A fundamental unit of a writing system , corresponding to (for example) letters in the English alphabet or jamo in Korean hangul .
secondary_definitions: ( Unicode ) A sequence of one or more code points that are processed and displayed as a single graphical unit of a writing system .
( linguistics ) In alphabetic writing, the shortest group of letters composing a phoneme .
